Sports and Clubs: Cricket, golf, squash, badminton, table-tennis, air pistol shooting
Social And Cultural Activities: Assisted in organising tourism festivals in Jhalawar (Rajasthan)
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Listening to music, watching movies and travelling and seeing new tourist sites
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Worked as a `research analyst ` for a report - Restaurant Industry - Trends & Opportunities, published by FHRAI
Special Interests: Reading tourism journals and political literature
Educational Qualifications: B.A. , M.B.A. (Hotel Administration) and P.G. Diploma in Hotel Operations Educated at St. Stephen`s College, Delhi, Johnson and Wales University, Providence, RI, USA and IHTTI School of Mangaement, Neuchatel, Switzerland
Other Information: Wants to help India progress into a developed nation and improve the standard and quality of life of its people starting in the State of Rajasthan; worked for Hospitality Valuation Servies (HVS), Delhi from July 2002 to October 2002 evaluating real estate; worked for Sheraton Hotel (U.S.A.) from June 1999 to March 2002 gaining experience in hospitality at one of the world`s largest chains which helped him manage and interact with people of different backgrounds and cultures; did internship at, (i) Hyatt Regency Hilton Head, South Carolina (U.S.A.), December 1998 - February 1999; (ii) Hotel Beau Rivage, Geneva, Switzerland, January 1997 - July 1997; and (iii) J. Thomas and Co. Pvt. Ltd., Kolkata, August 1994 - August 1995
Name: Singh,Shri Dushyant
Positions Held:
2004
Elected to 14th Lok Sabha

5 Aug. 2007 onwards
Member, Committee on Transport, Tourism and Culture

2009
Re-elected to 15th Lok Sabha (2nd term)

31 August 2009
Member, Committee on Transport, Tourism and Culture
